data.title: Lilya 4-Ever Original 2002 Swedish B1 Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 2002 Swedish B1 poster by Fellow Designers / Pers Anders Jorgensen for the film Lilya 4-Ever (Lilja 4-Ever) directed by Lukas Moodysson with Oksana Akinshina / Artyom Bogucharskiy / Lyubov Agapova / Liliya Shinkaryova.
